review: This inexpensive item does an awful lot of cool stuff.  I assumed you could cast ANYTHING that was on your Laptop/mobile screen onto your television.  That is not the case, but it is still a lot of fun and a great way to watch videos and movies.
author: Greg Webb

review: Use this almost every night. Only disadvantage is it does not automatically play the next episode you have to manually play it on whatever device you are using. A minor disadvantage imo.
author: Brett

review: The Chromecast by Google is a great buy! Very easy to stream YouTube videos from computer and phone directly to the tv! Worth the buy!
author: starfox

review: I guess I should have researched this a bit more - I was under the impression that you would be able to show what was on you phone or iPad on your TV. Not so - only YouTube and Netflix. I wanted the ability to show slidshow of pics or even look at Facebook :-(  At least it didn't cost much :-)
author: Jay

review: Simple in design and easy to use.  I just wish I could do more with it out of the box.  It was cheap enough for my to purchase out of curiosity.  I haven't used it regularly.  I think the last time I actually used it was 2-months ago
author: Amazon Customer

review: This could have been my issue if it wasn't described, but I purchased it to view my computer screen on the TV... When I tried to set it up, it turns out it doesn't work with a MacBook Air... While the tech help person was very helpful and DID get me up and running for a short period of time...it is not working now and I cannot get it working again with this computer.:(  Also, only works with certain sites...not all sites..my ignorance...as I assumed it would "mirror" my computer monitor..not the case...just be aware..It works great when it works with compatible computers/ipads and with specific sites like  You Tube, but that's not what I wanted it for.
author: bhyogini

review: I had used a Netgear streaming player in the past, but it just quit. I had bought 4 of the Google Chromecast players for family for Christmas and they all liked the ease of using their IPhones to program their watching preferences, so I decided to buy one for my bedroom. Love the ease of using it. Very easy to set up.
author: Betty H.
